entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and early this afternoon then 70 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of light snow changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
